Params[3]: When the lifeless Lithos falls to the sea surface, a lot of Corrupted suddenly show up in the water, stopping Bianca from retrieving Lithos' frame.
At the same time, the Omega Weapons are running at their maximum power in the entire battle. The Red Tide that once spread the entire sea surface has been properly contained.
Sieged by humans, the giant Hetero-Humanoid on the sea surface is also showing signs of fatigue.
We are running out of Omega Weapons. Somebody give that thing a final blow!
Karenina rants furiously.
Leave it to me, Karenina.
Bianca replies after returning from the battle on the ocean surface.
Bianca...! Are you hurt? You were lost at the bottom of the sea for days! What happened?!
A young male soaked in rain and vital fluid walks forward with the remaining Purifying Force members behind. He nods at Bianca.
Captain... I knew you would be fine. You are strong.
Don't worry. I'm fine.

Bianca looks around at the remaining members of the Purifying Force, who had suffered a substantial loss after engaging in battles with Hetero-Creatures for days. This young kid is still quite new, but he was forced to take up the role of the temporary captain.
Bianca grabs her Swordstaff as she gazes at the giant humanoid in front. Its distorted body has almost inflated to the height of a building.
The Ascendant has blended Chiko's consciousness with the Hetero-Humanoid's body... In other words, she also forms part of that monster.
She was the Vice-Captain of the Purifying Force team lost at the bottom of the sea.
Yes. She protected me after Copperfield Aquarium collapsed.
Are you talking about that monst... I mean, Hetero-Humanoid on the sea?
Chiko fought till the last moment before she was killed by the Ascendant.
With unprecedented might, Bianca gazes at all the Purifying Force members as they gather around in awe. They have never respected and feared their captain so much.
Vonnegut used Chiko as part of his Hetero-Humanoid experiment, but she was not simply consumed by that monster. Her mind still lives within—
You want to eliminate Chiko?
You... shouldn't hold your weapon against your friend...
Didn't you hear her calling for help?
Her consciousness was crumbled into pieces. She could only express her will in a fragmented manner.
—Still, her remaining consciousness had been trying to protect us.
That ever-expanding monster... is Vice-Captain Chiko...?

Params[2]: Has she been devouring the Hetero-Creatures that spawned in the sea...
To buy more time for humans?

Params[3]: ...I don't know. Perhaps it was just the instinct of the Hetero-Humanoid during its evolution. But I prefer to believe... that she is helping us.
Like I said, her shattered consciousness still lives in that monster...
It feels more like... She is struggling to end her life now.
Are you saying that monster is actually helping us?

Params[2]: Whether she is intentional or not.
We are benefiting from the fact that she is devouring the Punishing Virus and Hetero-Creatures.

Params[3]: Bianca's terminal has received a comms request... It is a message from Babylonia. She frowns when she sees the name of the sender.
Stigmata... Have you finally made up your mind to become a witch?
Maybe just like what you said, "Witch" forms part of me... It is just a necessary chain of my life.
But it doesn't mean I will be constricted by this identity... This sword is here to prove my determination.
Hah... Go for it then. We are also very interested in the subject's own preference.
I asked the Science Council to develop the frame exclusively for you. Take it as a gift. I'll be looking at you.
Vesalius hangs up abruptly. Teddy starts to dig through the files of devices in the camp as if she has recalled something.
Right... Bianca, before the Engineering Force came to the surface, the Science Council asked us to bring your equipment. That woman said you would definitely make use of it.
When was that...? Why was I not aware of it...?
Hah... She was probably concerned that your violence might break it, given it was highly complicated.
Teddy locates the container she was asked to bring along. To her surprise, there is a man in a white shirt curled up inside.
Ahhhhhhhh!
Ahhhhhhhh!
The screaming inside the container has also shocked Karenina when she tries to open it.
Yarha...? Why are you here...?
He is a scientist working for Kurono. Back in the lunar base, he spent some time with the Engineering Force duo and helped them.
You almost scared me to death... I thought the Corrupted had pried open this container.
It only takes Teddy a few seconds to figure out why.
Hah... I get it. That woman must be your boss. She must be punishing you for helping us out in the lunar base earlier.
Haha... She said, "Since you broke the zero-point engine, you should serve as a shock absorber to protect this gift." So...
Looks like Yarha's data of the zero-point engine saved his life. Otherwise, considering Kurono's way of doing things, the man named "Yarha" would have disappeared from the world.
So where is the "gift" she mentioned?
Yarha nods and takes out a machine.
Is this a... CUB? It has been configured to fit Bianca's Stigmata.
Yep. When expanded, this CUB can let Stigmata ride on it to achieve high-speed maneuver on water surface and low-attitude airspace.
Now I can get close to Chiko...
Commandant, let us engage in a deep M.I.N.D. connection.
Chiko's final wish was to let me end her suffering. That wish is also mine.
...I promised her.
You look into Bianca's genuine eyes. Her emotion is so strong that you cannot turn her down.

You then look back at other Gray Raven members. Liv has a serious look on her face. Lee also presses his lips together, but you can tell he is not objecting. Lucia just nods to you in all seriousness.
The Science Council used the tissues of the Hetero-Hive Mother to develop this device. I must admit, Bianca's new frame is more powerful than most of the Constructs here.
I will cover you with the rest of us!
Don't worry, Bianca. Commandant, I will constantly monitor your status... To ensure the stability of the deep connection.
Nobody knows Vice-Captain better than you, Captain... Still, you must be careful.
Dammit... We are sending you alone once again, Bianca...
I'm not fighting alone.
I have everyone on the coastline behind my back.
Looks like you have figured out what to do. Time to give an order!
Yes. We are all ready.
Godspeed, C-a-p-t-a-i-n.

Bianca looks at Palma and nods with a smile. Her smile looks nothing different from the past. The look of her frame no longer matters, for everyone understands it clearly at this moment—that Bianca is still Bianca, or rather, she is more determined than ever.

Params[2]: Let's roll. All combatants, get into position. Cover Bianca!

Params[3]: Alright... Teddy! Let's go!
Karenina screams at her terminal.
Make sure you come back safe and sound, Bianca! I haven't even had a proper look at your new frame!
I will.
— She used to stop Chiko from taking her own life, but this time... she will help her do it.
